,
from print_template_design where NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETE_FLAG = 'NOT_DELETE' limit 1

,
from print_template_design where NAME like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') and DELETE_FLAG = 'NOT_DELETE' order by CREATE_TIME desc limit 1
